full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## PSPC Bedford Row - Phone Booths

### Solicitation Details
| Reference | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | EB129-230075/A |
| Solicitation Title (English) | PSPC Bedford Row - Phone Booths |
| Solicitation Title (French) | SPAC Bedford Row - Cabines téléphoniques |
| Publication Date | 2022-11-10 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2022-12-01T13:00:00 |



### Contract Notice
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites bids from suppliers for the supply, delivery and installation of prefabricated private phone booths for PSPC Bedford Row.

**Contract Details**
* Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK
* Tendering Procedures: Competitive - Open bidding
* Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: Not applicable
* Delivery Date: February 28, 2023
* Service Location: Nova Scotia
* Contract Amount: Tenders Not to Exceed:$ [insert contract amount]

**Delivery Information**
Delivery is requested by February 28, 2023. Suppliers must deliver the product as per client’s instructions.

**Accountability and Communications**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
The chosen supplier will be responsible for the refill and installation of the delivered product. Suppliers may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process.

**Language**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Notice URL**
None

**Contact Information**
Contact: Grieve, Bronwen
Email: bronwen.grieve@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
Phone: (902) 943-2394
Fax: (902) 496-5016
Location: 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, Nova Scotia, B3J 1T3
